name: Cleaner Fever
description:
A game created for the Trijam #208.

This was our first attempt at making a game, both in general and as a team. We definitely went over the "3 hour" time restriction (probably closer to 12 hours), but we sure learned a lot. We're pretty proud of our first ever attempt - the fact that it's actually playable is a bonus.

  • Sprite pack: Cozy Interior Asset Pack by shubibubi
  • All other art: BridgetteBee
  • Music: 41 Short, Loopable Background Music Files by jhaeka
  • Dust collection sound: 8-bit / 16-bit Sound Effects by JDWasabi
